Description
Feel like C. Viper from Street Fighter IV with this slick pair of agent sunglasses! Wear them at night to show how cool you truly are.\n\nStreet Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]

Fühle dich mit dieser formschönen Agenten-Sonnenbrille wie C. Viper aus Street Fighter IV! Trage sie nachts - damit beweist du, wie cool du wirklich bist! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]

Prenez-vous pour C. Viper de Street Fighter IV avec ces lunettes de soleil ! Gardez-les de nuit pour montrer comme vous êtes cool ! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Diventa C. Viper di Street Fighter IV con questo paio di occhiali da sole da agente segreto! Mettiteli di notte per mostrare quanto sei cool! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
STREET FIGHTER IV 바이퍼가 되는 선글라스. 세련된 선글라스로 당신도 오늘부터 미즈 퍼팩트! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
